## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LSH3, OBO1</u>
- **Gene Name:** LIGHT SENSITIVE HYPOCOTYLS 3, ORGAN BOUNDARY 1
- **Description:**   LIGHT-DEPENDENT SHORT HYPOCOTYLS-like protein (DUF640);(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
